snippet.title: Time to Escape - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Add to wishlist: store.steampowered.com/app/2563050/Time_to_Escape/ 

"Time to Escape" is a cooperative puzzle game. Finding yourselves in a locked room, you and your friend, who is on the other side of the wall, must work together to solve complex puzzles. This must be done before the countdown timer reaches zero. The twist is that the clues for solving the puzzles are always on your friend's side!
